scripts.build: npm run build:scripts -s && npm run build:styles -s
scripts.build:scripts: browserify -d -e app/scripts -p [minifyify --compressPath . --map main.js.map --output dist/main.js.map] | hashmark -n dist/main.js -s -l 8 -m assets.json 'dist/{name}{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:styles: node-sass --source-map-embed app/styles/main.scss -o dist/  && hashmark -s -l 8 -m assests.json dist/main.css 'dist/{name}{hash}{ext}'
